fr.skyost.skyowallet.util

Class PlaceholderFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.skyost.skyowallet.util.PlaceholderFormatter

  • public class PlaceholderFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    Little utility class that allows to format Strings.
